alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Brantley; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, Pierce, southwestern Brantley, east central Ware, eastern Bacon, south central Appling and northeastern Charlton Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bristol to Homeland. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Blackshear, Folkston, Patterson, Homeland, Offerman, Bristol, Braganza, Race Pond, Fort Mudge and New Lacy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Brantley; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce
